title: Strengthening Medical Practical Competencies: Surface Mount Technology Defect Analysis and Machine Learning-Based Root Cause Identification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Electronics, Statistics, and Foundational Python Programming
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more major defect patterns (nozzle size errors, pickup position errors, etc.) in the Pick & Place (P&P) process of SMT manufacturing.
Learners can implement a machine learning model in Python to classify defect causes using Automated Optical Inspection (AOI) data.
Based on experimental data, the probability of defect occurrence and statistical characteristics (mean, standard deviation) can be analyzed to infer root causes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
